_comment: Resin Printer Configuration Profiles - MSLA, DLP, SLA, SLS Technologies

printers.name: Creality Halot One
printers.notes: MSLA resin printer. Integral cover. WiFi.

printers.name: Creality Halot Lite
printers.notes: 8.9 inch mono LCD. Budget large format.

printers.name: Creality LD-002R
printers.notes: 2K RGB LCD. Entry level resin printer.

printers.name: Anycubic Photon Mono
printers.notes: Mono LCD. 2.5s layer cure. Fast printing.

printers.name: Anycubic Photon D2
printers.notes: DLP projector. No LCD degradation. Long life.

printers.name: Anycubic Photon Ultra
printers.notes: DLP technology. Texas Instruments DMD chip.

printers.name: Elegoo Mars 4 Ultra
printers.notes: 9K resolution. Tilt release for easy printing.

printers.name: Elegoo Mars 4 DLP
printers.notes: DLP projector technology. No LCD wear.

printers.name: Elegoo Saturn 2
printers.notes: 10 inch 8K mono screen. Very large MSLA.

printers.name: Phrozen Transform
printers.notes: 13.3 inch 4K dual mono screens. Huge format.

printers.name: Peopoly Moai
printers.notes: True SLA with galvo mirrors. High precision.

printers.name: EPAX X1
printers.notes: 5.5 inch screen. High quality US brand.

printers.name: Kelant S400S
printers.notes: 8.9 inch mono LCD. Budget large format.

printers.name: Nexa3D XiP
printers.notes: LSPc technology. Ultra fast. Industrial grade.

printers.name: Carbon L1
printers.notes: Large format CLIP. Mass production capable.

technologies.MSLA: Masked Stereolithography - Uses LCD to mask UV light
technologies.DLP: Digital Light Processing - Uses projector with micro-mirrors
technologies.SLA_GALVO: Stereolithography - Uses laser with galvo mirrors
technologies.SLA_LFS: Low Force Stereolithography - Formlabs proprietary tech
technologies.CLIP: Continuous Liquid Interface Production - Carbon proprietary
technologies.SLS: Selective Laser Sintering - Powder bed fusion

_metadata.notes: Resin printers have null hotend and extruder values. bedType is always 'resin' for liquid photopolymer or 'powder' for SLS.
